sentences.sContent: Jan’s mother was dependent on her for physical care.
sentences.sCn: 简的母亲要靠简来照顾。

sentences.sContent: Do you have any dependent children (= who you are still supporting financially ) ?
sentences.sCn: 你有没有需要扶养的孩子？

sentences.sContent: ...is much less likely to use support services or to put the dependent person in a nursing home...
...Why are most wives unwilling to put their dependent husbands into nursing homes...
...are still mostly dependent on government funding...

synos.tran: 依靠的；从属的；取决于…的

phrases.pCn: 受抚养孩子，受供养子女；依赖其供养的子女

words.tran: 可靠的，可信赖的；可信任的
依赖，依靠；取决于；相信，信赖

trans.tranOther: needing someone or something in order to exist, be successful, be healthy etc
